# Test basic md2html functionality without server

# Test help output
exec md2html -h
stderr 'Usage of md2html'

# Create a simple test file
echo '# Test' > test_basic.md

# Start server briefly to test it works
exec md2html -input test_basic.md -http :8099 &
sleep 1s

# Test server responds
exec curl -s -o /dev/null -w '%{http_code}' http://localhost:8099/
stdout '200'

# Cleanup
exec pkill md2html
rm test_basic.md
